mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_consult( complaint_id, patient_name, visitor_name, visitor_mobile, patient_sex, patient_age, involve_hospital, involve_department, visitor_date, summary_of_disputes, appeal, status ) VALUES ( #{complaintId}, #{patientName}, #{visitorName}, #{visitorMobil}, #{patientSex}, #{patientAge}, #{involveHospital}, #{involveDepartment}, #{visitorDate}, #{summaryOfDisputes}, #{appeal}, #{status} )
